body_html:
After I fixed my Apple Clang Version problem (arrayfire/arrayfire#1384), I ran also into your problem.

MacOS: 10.12.5
Clang Version: Apple LLVM version 8.0.0 (clang-800.0.42.1)
Xcode Version: 8.2
NVCC Version: release 8.0, V8.0.61

Hope someone will find a solution for this? :(

body:
After I fixed my Apple Clang Version problem (https://github.com/arrayfire/arrayfire/issues/1384), I ran also into your problem.

MacOS: 10.12.5
Clang Version: Apple LLVM version 8.0.0 (clang-800.0.42.1)
Xcode Version: 8.2
NVCC Version: release 8.0, V8.0.61

Hope someone will find a solution for this? :(
